config.fastelytra.title: Fast Elytra Settings
config.fastelytra.disableJumpKeyStopsGli: Prevent jump key from stopping gliding.
config.fastelytra.speedBoostMultiplier.t: Change how fast your Elytra boosting is.
config.fastelytra.useWKeyForBoost.toolti: Use the W key for boosting.
config.fastelytra.serverMode.tooltip:
Choose how the mod works on multiplayer servers:
Unrestricted: Allow on all servers
Whitelist: Only allow on whitelisted servers
Blacklist: Allow on all except blacklisted servers
config.fastelytra.serverWhitelist.toolti:
List of servers where the mod is allowed (whitelist mode only).
Enter server addresses like: example.server.com
config.fastelytra.serverBlacklist.toolti:
List of servers where the mod is disabled (blacklist mode only).
Enter server addresses like: banned.server.com
